result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Troy Jonathan Randle Jr

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Troy Jonathan Randle Jr in court.  Attorney Mark Stuart Tishberg in court for Troy Jonathan Randle Jr.  Attorney Gerald Alder in court on behalf of Attorney James C Griffin for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a final pre-trial.  Matter remains in trial posture.  No outstanding issues or motions raised by the parties.  Jury Trial remains calendared on November 7, 2022 at 9:00 AM for first call.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.

Defendant Troy Jonathan Randle in court with attorney Mark Stuart Tishberg.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Defense requests a final pretrial and jury trial date. Case adjourned, Branch 2.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Troy Jonathan Randle in court with attorney Mark Stuart Tishberg.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held off the record via Zoom. Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Mark Stuart Tishberg in court, defendant Troy Jonathan Randle not in court, in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for final pretrial. For reasons stated, Defense requests a status conference date. Court vacates 06-21-2022 jury trial date. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Troy Jonathan Randle in court with attorney Mark Stuart Tishberg who is in court.  Allysa Brown appears for James Griffin who appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Troy Jonathan Randle appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Court canceled the stayed bench warrant based on defendant's by zoom.   Case adjourned for final pretrial and for jury trial in Branch 2.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Mark Stuart Tishberg in court.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Case scheduled for scheduling conference.  Defendant failing to appear.  Defense counsel requests that the Court impose and stay a warrant.  State has no objection. Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next court date.  Calendar call scheduled for March 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered no possession or use of any dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with J.L.U.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 02, Judge Childs. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 02.
Court ordered arrest warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Defendant Troy Jonathan Randle in court with attorney Mark Stuart Tishberg.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Recalled at 2:27
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Troy Jonathan Randle not in court.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. Court makes a finding that there is a possible victim identified and stays the forfeiture order with restitution to be determined at close of case.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 2/23/22 @ 1:30p
